channel.title: Uke Along Artist » Ben E. King

item.title: Ben E. King - Stand By Me - Key of A
item.description:
For Educational Use. As performed by Ben E. King. In the Key of A (Key of A: A, F#m, D, E7). Pay attention to the suggested fingering for the D chord.
Acknowledgement to the original YouTube Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BTCfQ6Bb8QE
The ukulele font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com
